# Gitbook quiz

Gitbook lets you write a quiz using GFM tables:

---

Here's a quiz about Gitbook

|                  | Good | Bad |
| ---------------- | ---- | --- |
| What is Gitbook? | ( )  | ( ) |

|                  | Good | Bad |
| ---------------- | ---- | --- |
| What is Gitbook? | (x)  | ( ) |

> Gitbook is good
